original_text: And when Jesus had crossed again in the boat to the other side, a great crowd gathered about him, and he was beside the sea.
korean_text: 예수께서 배를 타시고 다시 맞은편으로 건너가시니 큰 무리가 그에게로 모이거늘 이에 바닷가에 계시더니

sentences.original_text: And when Jesus had crossed again in the boat to the other side,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 다시 배를 타고 저편으로 건너셨을 때,

sentences.original_text: a great crowd gathered about him,
and he was beside the sea.
